stories.descriptionTitle: Chosse the story that fit your style
stories.descriptionBody: The stories build by the community offer an immersive and interactive reading experience that allows the reader to become the protagonist and actively shape the outcome of the story. With gamebooks, you get to experience the thrill of adventure, the rush of making critical decisions, and the satisfaction of seeing how your choices play out in the story. The stories are perfect for people who want to be more than just a passive reader and want to be in control of the story.

builder.descriptionBody: The builder will allows you to create interactive fiction stories in the format of a 'choose-your-own-adventure' book. Use the visual editor that allows you to organize and connect different sections of your story, as well as options for incorporating various types of multimedia, such as images and sound effects. You are also  able to define conditions and results that branches the story path depending on the choice taken by the reader.
